name: VR Skirmish on Solar System Planets: Shooting Battle
name_original: VR Skirmish on Solar System Planets: Shooting Battle
description:
Players will start a VR simulation shooting adventure in outer space! This is an adventure game that focuses on space shooting. Wearing a VR helmet, players can experience virtual simulation of space battle scenes. By manipulating the gamepad, they can destroy aliens while looking for and destroy the big boss while moving forward. The fierce shooting war in space, relax your mind and body. Destroy the aliens in the space capsule, go through the portal to the desert no man’s land, continue to shoot the aliens attacking the player, enter the urban area, look for the last portal, and find the big boss with red skin and taller body. Eliminate it to complete this adventure.

Instructions:
mobile:
The left handle touchpad controls the player to move back and forth;
The right handle touchpad controls the player's steering
attack;
The trigger button on the right handle fires bullets
menu:
The right handle changes the click position, and the right handle trigger button presses the corresponding button;
Press the menu button in the game to call up the menu interface, press the menu button again to close the menu.
